titleStmt.title: The prices of fares and passages to be paide unto watermen from London to Grauesende, and likewise from Grauesend to London, and to euery common place betwene and also betwene London Bridge and Windesoure, and so to euery common place of landyng betwene London Bridge and Windesoure.
titleStmt.author: Watermen's Company (London, England)

titleStmt.title: The prices of fares and passages to be paide unto watermen from London to Grauesende, and likewise from Grauesend to London, and to euery common place betwene and also betwene London Bridge and Windesoure, and so to euery common place of landyng betwene London Bridge and Windesoure.
titleStmt.author: Watermen's Company (London, England)

publicationStmt.publisher: Jmprinted at London in Powles Churcheyarde, by John Cawood, prynter to the Quenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.
